B

background - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
The object which will encode the menu's background
batch - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
Batch that manages the rendering pipeline for all of the images to be displayed on the screen
batch - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.SplashScreen
Batch that manages the rendering pipeline for all of the images to be displayed on the screen
BMFont - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.TTFont
A core BitMapFont object that the class encapsulates The class simply serves to take .TTF files and convert them into Bitmap fonts, which can then be rendered in-game This is the object that can be returned to any other class that desires a BitmapFont
borderColor() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.TTFont
Returns the (consistent) colour of the borders around the internal BitmapFont's characters
borderedRectangle(Color, Color, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Drawer
Draws a bordered, solid-coloured rectangle on the next frame to be rendered This basically draws a filled rectangle and a line-only rectangle of equal dimensions in the same place
borderWidth() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.TTFont
Returns the (consistent) width of the borders around the internal BitmapFont's characters
buttons - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
Array of buttons to populate the screen's interface with
buttons - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
Array of all menu buttons
buy(String, Integer, Player) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Market
A method that allows buying resources from the market.
buyEnergy - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Button in the market's interface that buys energy
buyFood - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Button in the market's interface that buys food
buyOre - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Button in the market's interface that buys ore
buyRoboticon - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Button in the market's interface that buys Roboticons
